content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 61.0, -52.0) with an inventory that includes coal and copper ore.

### New Stone Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 61.0, -52.0) with an inventory that includes copper ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient inventory
- Ensure you have enough coal in your inventory before inserting it into the furnace. The furnace requires a minimum of 5 coal to operate.
- Verify that you have enough raw materials (iron ore, copper ore) to insert into the furnace to avoid smelting timeouts.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Make sure to be within reach of the resource you want to harvest. If nothing is within reach, you will not be able to harvest it.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Check the furnace inventory before inserting items to ensure it has enough capacity and that you have the required fuel and inputs.
- Confirm that your inventory contains the required items before attempting to insert them into the newly placed furnace.
- Ensure that you have copper ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has produced the items you are trying to extract. If the furnace has not smelted any items, you will not be able to extract them.

### Errors when placing items into a new furnace
- Confirm that your inventory contains the required items before attempting to insert them into the newly placed furnace.

### Errors related to connecting entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory to connect entities. Check your inventory before attempting to connect power sources to your furnace.

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the necessary sub-ingredients in your inventory to craft items, such as copper plates for copper cables, before attempting to craft.

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Check that you have sufficient fuel and inputs in the furnace. If the furnace is idle for too long due to lack of ingredients, it will trigger a smelting timeout error.
